basic.description: This laboratory is an introduction to quantitative techniques and chemical laboratory. Topics include stoichiometry, atomic spectra, thermodynamics, gases, as well as acids and bases, chemical structures and reactivity.
basic.subject: CHM
basic.title: Honors General Chemistry I Laboratory

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: MAC 1105 with a grade of "C-" or higher or placement beyond MAC 1105. Corequisite: CHM 1050.
